nodes.bodyText: We usually use plain strings for the class names in the build items.
This needs proper Javadoc. Not entirely sure about the name.
Why not adding the whole org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations package?

The implementation of the detection of "allowed" annotation was not able to detect the root package of an annotation, only the package of the annotation itself, that's why I included all package of every OpenApi annotations.
I improved the detection to declare the root package of a set of annotations like OpenAPI
